languages.text: {n}Неожиданно человек вскидывает голову и смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Ты изгнал{mf||а} зло... ты пытал{mf|ся|ась} предупредить меня, но я был глух... корабль... Кьява Гамма... оно пришло за нами оттуда..."

{n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."
languages.original_text: {n}Неожиданно человек вскидывает голову и смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Ты изгнал{mf||а} зло... ты пытал{mf|ся|ась} предупредить меня, но я был глух... корабль... Кьява Гамма... оно пришло за нами оттуда..."

{n}Suddenly, he raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

{n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

{n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

{n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

{n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

languages.text: {n}突然间，这个人抬起了头，直视着你的双眼。{/n}“你已经驱逐了邪恶之物……你曾试图警告过我，可我却充耳不闻……这艘船……基亚瓦伽马星……它从那时起，便一直在跟踪我们……”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然间，这个人抬起了头，直视着你的双眼。{/n}“你已经驱逐了邪恶之物……你曾试图警告过我，可我却充耳不闻……这艘船……基亚瓦伽马星……它从那时起，便一直在跟踪我们……”

languages.text: {n}De pronto, el hombre levanta la cabeza y te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Ha desterrado el mal... ha intentado advertirme, pero era sordo... la nave... Kiava Gamma... nos siguió desde allí...».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto, el hombre levanta la cabeza y te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Ha desterrado el mal... ha intentado advertirme, pero era sordo... la nave... Kiava Gamma... nos siguió desde allí...».

languages.text: {n}すると突然、男は頭を起こしてこちらの目を真っ直ぐ見つめた。{/n}「悪を払ってくれた…あんたは警告を、なのに私は耳を貸さず…船が…キアヴァ・ガンマ…そこから、付いてきた…」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}すると突然、男は頭を起こしてこちらの目を真っ直ぐ見つめた。{/n}「悪を払ってくれた…あんたは警告を、なのに私は耳を貸さず…船が…キアヴァ・ガンマ…そこから、付いてきた…」

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich hebt der Mann den Kopf und blickt dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ihr habt das Böse gebannt ... Ihr wolltet mich warnen, aber ich war taub ... das Schiff ... Kiava Gamma ... es ist uns von dort gefolgt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich hebt der Mann den Kopf und blickt dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ihr habt das Böse gebannt ... Ihr wolltet mich warnen, aber ich war taub ... das Schiff ... Kiava Gamma ... es ist uns von dort gefolgt ..."

languages.text: {n}Soudain, il lève la tête et vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Vous avez banni le mal... vous avez tenté de me prévenir, mais j'ai fait la sourde oreille... le vaisseau... Kiava Gamma... il nous a suivis depuis là-bas... »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, il lève la tête et vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Vous avez banni le mal... vous avez tenté de me prévenir, mais j'ai fait la sourde oreille... le vaisseau... Kiava Gamma... il nous a suivis depuis là-bas... »

languages.text: {n}Adam aniden başını kaldırıp bakışlarını gözlerine dikiyor.{/n} "Sen, şerri defettin. Beni uyarmaya çalıştın. Bense sana kulak asmadım. Gemi... Kiava Gama... Oradan beri peşimizde."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the man raises his head and looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "You have banished the evil... you tried to warn me, but I was deaf... the ship... Kiava Gamma... it followed us from there..."
